name: Wayfarer (Emily Pitcher, KKCreates, wath, JulyL, yiyizeto, keycard, Caroline Wang, Lucasdabass, smudge12, Lancival)
name_original: Wayfarer (Emily Pitcher, KKCreates, wath, JulyL, yiyizeto, keycard, Caroline Wang, Lucasdabass, smudge12, Lancival)
description:
College student Misaki and her best friend Summer embark on a trip to Japan to attend the Obon festival, a custom to honor one's ancestors. But things aren't the same after Misaki's difficult breakup. Not to mention she's been having this nightmare about navigating a ship through storms...

Our game is a deckbuilding puzzle game meets a wholesome story about friendship.

Features:

  • A maid cafe filled with cute girls
  • Hilarious adventures with Summer
  • A wacky sushi chef
  • 80's anime-style art
  • 3 endings
  • Your choices in the story impact the cards you get for the puzzle, which determines the ending
  • Did we mention cute girls?
